data.name: Sample - AWS DynamoDB - 1.0.0
data.description: AWS DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service that provides fast and predictable performance with seamless scalability. This connector facilitates the automate operations related to manage database table, data and backup.

workflows.description: Create a new table in AWS DynamoDB with the specified table name and attributes.
workflows.name: Create Table

workflows.description: Delete an existing table from AWS DynamoDB
workflows.name: Delete Table

workflows.description: Updated an existing table of AWS DynamoDB.
workflows.name: Update Table

workflows.description: Retrieves list of existing tables from AWS DynamoDB
workflows.name: Get Table List

workflows.description: Retrieve information about specified table from AWS DynamoDB
workflows.name: Get Table Details

workflows.description: Adds a new or updates an existing item in the specified table.
workflows.name: Create or Update Table Item

arguments.title: AWS DynamoDB: Create or Update Table Item

routes.name: Start-> Create or Update Table Item

workflows.description: Deleted an item in specified table
workflows.name: Delete Table Item

workflows.description: Search items in the specified table.
workflows.name: Search Table Item

workflows.description: Search items in the specified table.
workflows.name: Get Table Items List

arguments.title: AWS DynamoDB: Get Table Items List

workflows.description:
Creates a global table for the existing table. This operation only applies to Version 2017.11.29 of global tables. Make sure that following conditions are satisfied by existing table before creating Global Table for the same.
 1. A Table must be empty. 
 2. A Log stream with type 'New and Old Images' must be enabled for a table.
workflows.name: Create Global Table

workflows.description: Retrieve the information about the specified global table.
workflows.name: Get Global Table Details

arguments.title: AWS DynamoDB: Get Global Table Details

workflows.description: Retrieves list of all the global tables that have a replica in the specified Region.
workflows.name: Get Global Table List

arguments.title: AWS DynamoDB: Get Global Table List

workflows.description: Creates a backup for an existing table in AWS DynamoDB.
workflows.name: Create Table Backup

workflows.description: Retrieve the details of an existing backup of a table in AWS DynamoDB.
workflows.name: Get Table Backup Details

arguments.title: AWS DynamoDB: Get Table Backup Details

workflows.description: Retrieves list of backups from AWS DynamoDB.
workflows.name: Get Table Backup List

arguments.title: AWS DynamoDB: Get Table Backup List

workflows.description: Deletes an existing backup of a table from AWS DynamoDB.
workflows.name: Delete Table Backup
